name: The Wall-Jumping Cube
description:
"The Wall-Jumping Cube" is a short, free platformer game made using the Godot game engine. You play as a small cube who has to slide, jump, and climb to reach the end of 5 levels.

I made this in extra time during computer science class, so it isn't much, but I'd love to hear some feedback. Let me know if something doesn't work properly!
